sentences.sContent: He could diagnose an engine problem simply by listening.
sentences.sContent_eng: He could diagnose an engine problem simply by listening.
sentences.sCn: 他仅靠听就能判断发动机出了什么问题。

sentences.sContent: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat or prevent any disease.
sentences.sContent_eng: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat or prevent any disease.
sentences.sCn: 此产品并不供作诊断、治疗或预防任何疾病之用。

sentences.sContent: You can also diagnose your weaknesses with this simple exercise.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can also diagnose your weaknesses with this simple exercise.
sentences.sCn: 这样的简单练习还可以诊断你的缺点。

remMethod.val: dia(穿过)+g＋nose(鼻)→透过鼻子来诊断→诊断

trans.tranOther: to find out what illness someone has, or what the cause of a fault is, after doing tests, examinations etc
